content: If it makes you feel any better. most of us are mentally ill and want to talk about it. We all have issues with ourself, work, identity, family, spouse, friends. Some of us have issues that we can’t share with anyone. People look happy. Only God knows if they are actually happy I wish there was a chance were you could speak and get some form of a virtual hug—while no one knows who you are. Anonymous posts have never made me feel secure nor made me feel I would get the correct response.
